channel.title: Are there any smart people in the Server Downloads section?
channel.description:
I can't find one person who doesn't talk like: "H0LY SHT DUEED NCIE SREVERMA N!#@!#@#$@#$#@$%$#"
WTF?

item.title: Are there any smart people in the Server Downloads section?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:23, topic:387109”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=482906.msg3538513#msg3538513 date=1300694647]

I can’t find one person who doesn’t talk like: “H0LY SHT DUEED NCIE SREVERMA N!#@!#@#$@#$#@$%$#”

WTF?

Thats because all of the people who build something worth sharing will not share it with a community full of people still bent out on the fact that deltas are amazing with crappy customs that would take someone with an IQ of 5 to fix the ints on them but they still don’t do it.
[/quote]

thats good ole moparscape for ya :)[/quote]
Yup (:

Read full topic
item.source: Are there any smart people in the Server Downloads section?

item.title: Are there any smart people in the Server Downloads section?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:8, topic:387109”]trying to be cool.[/quote]Trying?
[/quote]
Alot of the times when I ask a newcommer why they want to make a server, the reason to learn it, just to own one, or anything of the sorts never comes up. I generally (80% of the time or so) get the answers “to make money”, or even “for me and friends” (2nd one sounds to me like “to look cool”).

Read full topic
item.source: Are there any smart people in the Server Downloads section?

item.title: Are there any smart people in the Server Downloads section?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=482906.msg3536533#msg3536533 date=1300590475]
That is because 99.5(ish)% of the members on here are only active in the help (for getting, not giving) and downloads section.
[/quote]I am glad you only see me as 0.5%. :([/quote]
Trust me, its a good thing. You are active in server help, for GIVING help, other than that I am unsure, I would be there too if it wasn’t for my lack of knowledge on the PI base (guess i should learn some of it?). Anyways, its a good thing, as it means you are not here for 100% downloading servers and trying to be cool.

Read full topic
item.source: Are there any smart people in the Server Downloads section?
